title: Which true about blind spot in eye

content.prompt: Which of the following is true about the blind spot in the eye?

choices.label: It occurs where the optic nerve leaves the eye.
It is caused by an excess of bipolar cells in the retina.
It is most apparent in low levels of illumination.
It is stimulated only by high levels of illumination.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
